segment.source: User Access Permissions in Application Virtualization Client
segment.target: User Access Permissions in Application Virtualization Client

segment.source: User Access Permissions in Application Virtualization Client
segment.target: User Access Permissions in Application Virtualization Client

segment.source: User Access Permissions in Application Virtualization Client
segment.target: User Access Permissions in Application Virtualization Client

segment.source: On the Permissions tab on the Properties dialog box, accessible by right-clicking the Application Virtualization node in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console, administrators can grant users permissions to use the various client functions.
segment.target: On the Permissions tab on the Properties dialog box, accessible by right-clicking the Application Virtualization node in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console, administrators can grant users permissions to use the various client functions.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Before changing users permissions, ensure that any permissions changes are consistent with the organization's guidelines for granting user permissions.
segment.target: Before changing users permissions, ensure that any permissions changes are consistent with the organization's guidelines for granting user permissions.

segment.source: The following table lists and describes the permissions that can be granted to users.
segment.target: The following table lists and describes the permissions that can be granted to users.

segment.source: Permission Name
segment.target: Permission Name

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Add applications
segment.target: Add applications

segment.source: Register new applications by passing a new OSD file to the client by using sfttray.exe, sftmime.exe or the MMC.
segment.target: Register new applications by passing a new OSD file to the client by using sfttray.exe, sftmime.exe or the MMC.

segment.source: Change file system cache size
segment.target: Change file system cache size

segment.source: Increase the size of the file system cache.
segment.target: Increase the size of the file system cache.

segment.source: Change file system drive
segment.target: Change file system drive

segment.source: Select a different preferred drive letter for the file system.
segment.target: Select a different preferred drive letter for the file system.

segment.source: Change log settings
segment.target: Change log settings

segment.source: Change the log level or the log path for the client log file.
segment.target: Change the log level or the log path for the client log file.

segment.source: Change OSD files
segment.target: Change OSD files

segment.source: Modify OSD files for registered applications and pass them into the client.
segment.target: Modify OSD files for registered applications and pass them into the client.

segment.source: This does not affect publishing refresh.
segment.target: This does not affect publishing refresh.

segment.source: Clear application settings
segment.target: Clear application settings

segment.source: Delete file types, shortcuts and any configurations for the current user.
segment.target: Delete file types, shortcuts and any configurations for the current user.

segment.source: Delete applications
segment.target: Delete applications

segment.source: Remove all references to an application from the file system and OSD cache for all users on the computer.
segment.target: Remove all references to an application from the file system and OSD cache for all users on the computer.

segment.source: Import applications into the cache
segment.target: Import applications into the cache

segment.source: Load application data directly from a specified SFT file into the file system cache.
segment.target: Load application data directly from a specified SFT file into the file system cache.

segment.source: This affects all users.
segment.target: This affects all users.

segment.source: Load applications into the cache
segment.target: Load applications into the cache

segment.source: Start a load of the SFT file for an application from the configured source, such as an App-V Streaming Server.
segment.target: Start a load of the SFT file for an application from the configured source, such as an App-V Streaming Server.

segment.source: This loads the application for all users on the computer.
segment.target: This loads the application for all users on the computer.

segment.source: Lock and unlock applications in the cache
segment.target: Lock and unlock applications in the cache

segment.source: Prevent or allow applications from being unloaded from the file system cache.
segment.target: Prevent or allow applications from being unloaded from the file system cache.

segment.source: This affects all users on the computer.
segment.target: This affects all users on the computer.

segment.source: Manage file type associations
segment.target: Manage file type associations

segment.source: Add, modify, or delete file type associations for the current user only.
segment.target: Add, modify, or delete file type associations for the current user only.

segment.source: Manage publishing refresh settings
segment.target: Manage publishing refresh settings

segment.source: Change settings that control the timing of publishing refreshes for all users on the computer.
segment.target: Change settings that control the timing of publishing refreshes for all users on the computer.

segment.source: Manage publishing servers
segment.target: Manage publishing servers

segment.source: Add, modify, or delete publishing servers for all users on the computer.
segment.target: Add, modify, or delete publishing servers for all users on the computer.

segment.source: This permission implicitly includes permission to manage publishing refresh settings.
segment.target: This permission implicitly includes permission to manage publishing refresh settings.

segment.source: Publish shortcuts
segment.target: Publish shortcuts

segment.source: Create new shortcuts to registered applications.
segment.target: Create new shortcuts to registered applications.

segment.source: The user must also have permission to create files in the local file system.
segment.target: The user must also have permission to create files in the local file system.

segment.source: Repair applications
segment.target: Repair applications

segment.source: Remove application specific configurations for the current user without removing shortcuts or file type associations.
segment.target: Remove application specific configurations for the current user without removing shortcuts or file type associations.

segment.source: Start a publishing refresh
segment.target: Start a publishing refresh

segment.source: Start an unscheduled publishing refresh for the current user.
segment.target: Start an unscheduled publishing refresh for the current user.

segment.source: Toggle offline mode
segment.target: Toggle offline mode

segment.source: Change the entire client from online to offline mode for all users.
segment.target: Change the entire client from online to offline mode for all users.

segment.source: Unload applications from the cache
segment.target: Unload applications from the cache

segment.source: Clear application data from the file system cache for all users without removing user-specific settings, shortcuts, or file type associations.
segment.target: Clear application data from the file system cache for all users without removing user-specific settings, shortcuts, or file type associations.

segment.source: View all applications
segment.target: View all applications

segment.source: Allow the user to see the virtual applications for all users registered on the computer.
segment.target: Allow the user to see the virtual applications for all users registered on the computer.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.target: How to Change User Access Permissions
